effect.text: Choose 1 Basic Pokémon card from your opponent's discard pile and put it onto his or her Bench. (You can't play Pokémon Flute if your opponent's Bench is full.)

requirements.description: Opponent's bench must not be full (must have fewer than 5 Pokemon)

tips: Best used in combination with Gust of Wind for immediate value
Wait until opponent has discarded weak Basics before using
Consider filling their bench to limit their options for playing new Basics
Excellent in decks with spread damage or bench damage capabilities
Use to bring back Pokemon with favorable weakness matchups for your deck
Check opponent's discard pile carefully before playing to choose the best target

rulings.ruling: You can only play Pokemon Flute if your opponent's bench has fewer than 5 Pokemon on it
You choose which Basic Pokemon card to take from your opponent's discard pile
The Pokemon goes directly to your opponent's bench, not their hand
Only Basic Pokemon can be chosen - you cannot choose Evolution cards
The Pokemon is placed on the bench with no damage counters (even if it had damage when discarded)
No Energy or other cards attached to the Pokemon when it was discarded come back with it
You can look through your opponent's discard pile at any time to plan your play
If there are no Basic Pokemon in the opponent's discard pile, you cannot play Pokemon Flute
